channel.title: Be notified when apps you use are updated :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Be notified when apps you use are updated Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code. They tend to walk the reader through administrative tasks but not exclusively. They might include code snippets such as API requests and responses, or outline how to develop the required solution but without walking through the majority of the code required to implement it.
